body.raw:
This is the official documentation for OpenAssistantGPT - everything is still a work in process and we are just getting started. Here you can find information about our chatbots, crawlers, files and prices.

Note also that the documentation is also used to train our little chatbot displayed on the homepage, allowing you to ask him almost anything and expect an answer.

For more detailed information and implementation guidelines, you can visit our website.
